subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Kyle Padron threw for 460 yards and 2 touchdowns as Southern Methodist University routed Nevada, 45-10, in the Hawaii Bowl in Honolulu. It was S.M.U.’s first bowl game since 1984.
snippet: Kyle Padron threw for 460 yards and 2 touchdowns as Southern Methodist University routed Nevada, 45-10, in the Hawaii Bowl in Honolulu. It was S.M.U.’s first bowl game since 1984.
